subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ryan Getzlaf and Corey Perry, who recently signed extensions, have helped Anaheim climb to 3 points behind Chicago. The Ducks have won 13 straight at home.
snippet: Ryan Getzlaf and Corey Perry, who recently signed extensions, have helped Anaheim climb to 3 points behind Chicago. The Ducks have won 13 straight at home.
